meta.description: Tiggidoo, new residential cleaning service platform! Find a housekeeper, among qualified professionals in housekeeping

section_1.title: Tiggidoo connects professional residential housekeepers and their future clients
section_1.paragraph_1: Free of charge, without commitment or complications, the Tiggidoo platform allows you to receive job offers and manage them as you see fit.
section_1.paragraph_2: Enjoy integrated management tools on your ToDoo account specially designed to make your job easier.
section_1.paragraph_3: Tiggidoo is the ideal solution for all self-employed workers in residential housekeeping who are looking to increase their income.

section_2.title: A platform that improves your organization on a daily basis
section_2.li2: Simple and easy creation of your ToDoo account
section_2.li5: Technical support from the Tiggidoo team

section_3.title: How does it work?
section_3.description_1: You are the boss! You decide where and when you work.
section_3.description_2: Bingo! Your profile has been selected by your future client:
section_3.step_1: Be immediately notified by email when a new offer has arrived on your ToDoo account.
section_3.step_2: View the client’s offer which you can accept or refuse.
section_3.step_3: Perform a quality cleaning service and receive a positive rating on your profile.
section_3.step_4: Claim your payment quickly and securely.

section_4.title: Offer your housekeeping services with Tiggidoo

step_1.title: Answer a few questions
step_1.description: Complete the online registration form. Quick and simple, this allows the Tiggidoo team to pre-select future ToDoo.

step_2.title: Participate in a remote interview
step_2.description: At this stage, a virtual interview of a few minutes allows us to define both sides’ expectations. We will also validate your information and respond to your questions.

step_3.title: Join the ToDoo squad
step_3.description: Your profile will be online as soon as your registration is complete. You will receive email notifications as soon as an offer matches your selected criteria.

section_6.title: Ready to increase your income?
section_6.description: Start the recruitment process now. You will get an answer in less than 48 hours.

section_7.title: The 4 essential criteria to integrate the Tiggidoo platform
section_7.paragraph_1: The Tiggidoo platform connects people looking for quality cleaning services and self-employed housekeeping experts. Trust, respect and commitment to quality are the core values of our company. This is why you must meet a few criteria to become a ToDoo and receive service requests on our platform.

step_1.title: A verified identity
step_1.description: For obvious security reasons, we verify the identity of all self-employed workers who register on the Tiggidoo platform.

step_2.title: A valid bank account
step_2.description: You must have a bank account in your name to receive payment for carrying out your housekeeping services.

step_3.title: Access to the Internet
step_3.description: Whether from a computer or a smartphone, an internet connection is essential to operate smoothly on the Tiggidoo platform.

step_4.title: Respect our code of conduct
step_4.description: In order to provide impeccable service to each customer, you must agree to respect our general conditions, the terms of each service and our code of conduct.

section_8.title: A 100% human service
section_8.description: Do you need additional information? Don’t hesitate to ask us your questions, a human will happily answer you as fast as possible.

validations.telephoneFilds: The phone must have a minimum of 10 digits
validations.photo: A photo is required for registration
validations.cellPhoneLabelError: This email and phone number already exists

FormPersonalDetails.title: Join the Todoo team today!
FormPersonalDetails.description1: To join the Tiggidoo platform, please fill out this form. We will review your
FormPersonalDetails.description2: application and get back to you within 48 hours

groupCheckBox_2.title: Are you over 18 years old and legally authorized to work in Canada?

groupCheckBox_3.title: Do you have a criminal history?

FormPersonalBackground.title: What is your story?

groupCheckBox_1.title: Have you ever worked as a housekeeper?

FormPersonalBackground.referencesTitle: Please fill in the contact information of two of your previous employers

groupCheckBox_2.title: Why do you wish to be a part of the Tiggidoo platform?

FormAdditionalInformation.title: A few things about you
FormAdditionalInformation.subtitle: We need a little bit more information about you

groupCheckBox_1.title: Do you have a smartphone with access to data?

FormAdditionalInformation.paragraph: At Tiggidoo, communication is essential. We have to be able to reach each other at any moment. This is why we insist that having a smartphone with data is a necessity

groupCheckBox_2.title: Do you have any allergies or health problems?

FormAdditionalInformation.paragraph_2: Not specifying the allergy or health issue can result in your application being rejected
FormAdditionalInformation.paragraphPhoto: Attach a professional photo of yourself. This will be used to create your user profile on the platform

Confirmation.title: Thank you
Confirmation.subTitle: Your from is being reviewed by our team
Confirmation.description1: Humans are at the core of our values and we pride ourselves in carefully studying each application
Confirmation.description2: We will contact you once a decision has been made regarding your file

Hero.text1: connects you to residential cleaning experts. Instantly receive a quote online, submit your request and get profiles of qualified housekeepers.

Services.title: The platform that takes care of you
Services.service2Text2: Select a Todoo according to your criteria
Services.service3Text1: Home treated with respect and care
Services.service3Text2: Services following a charter of excellence
Services.service3Text3: Reviews and ratings after each service
Services.service4Text3: Cleaning frequency according to your needs

Steps.title: Say goodbye to household chores with a snap of your finger
Steps.description1: is a one of a kind networking platform. Everything’s been thought of to make your life easier
Steps.description2: Who would have thought it was this easy to clean!
Steps.step1Description: Our system automatically selects the Todoo - the available housekeepers in the area of your residence. You will have access to your neighborhood’s best housekeepers, all ready to meet your needs!
Steps.step2Description: Answer a few questions about your home. Add some options and choose the cleaning frequency. Instantly get a quote from TIGGIDOO for your future service
Steps.step3Title: Choose the offer that suits you
Steps.step3Description: It’s time to select your favorite Todoo. You will receive many profiles from male and female housekeepers showcasing their expertise and satisfaction ratings submitted by users like you.
Steps.step4Description: To book your housekeeping service, simply pay on your private portal. Our payment platform is completely secure and your cleaning pro will only receive payment after the service is completed.

Experts.title: Do you know the
Experts.text1: They’re the experts in residential housekeeping - male and female housekeepers carefully selected by our team and rated by users like you.
Experts.text2: automatically offers requests from the most qualified Todoo according to your area, requirements and type of residence.
Experts.text3: All you have to do is select your preferred profile, confirm your quote and you’re good to go!

Advantages.title: The benefits of using the Tiggidoo platform

ProposeServices.title: Offer your services now!
ProposeServices.text2: offers you a range of integrated management tools specifically designed for self-employed residential housekeepers. Free and efficient, they will help you save time and, especially, earn more money.

Footer.copyright: © 2021 Tiggidoo Platform Inc – All rights reserved

Logement.sectionTitle1: TELL US MORE ABOUT YOUR HOME
Logement.housingType_studio_text1: If your accommodation is studio type, then it must respect the following elements:
Logement.housingType_studio_text2: The kitchen, the living area and the bedroom area are in the same space
Logement.housingSpecificity_floor_desc: A basement is considered a floor
Logement.footer_text: This platform is reserved for personal residences. If you are looking for a cleaning service for a short-term rental,

sideBar.info_text: The listed price is an estimate made according to the average market price in each city. This can change depending on the details of the residence and the request. TIGGIDOO declines any responsibiliy if the final price differs from the estimate.

Benefit.title3: Time and date of the cleaning
Benefit.section2_desc: Choose the options you would like for your service. You will see the price details when the PROS submit their proposals in response to your request.
Benefit.section2_option1_desc: Complete cleaning if oven cleaner is provided
Benefit.section2_option2_desc: Complete cleaning if food has been removed
Benefit.section2_option3_desc: Clean sheets must be left on the bed(s)
Benefit.section2_option4_desc: The PRO will use their own cleaning materials
Benefit.section2_option5_desc: The PRO uses certified and 100% natural products
Benefit.section2_option6_desc: The PRO uses standard cleaning products
Benefit.section2_agree: I agree to provide all necessary cleaning products for a successful service.
Benefit.section3_desc1: Indicate the day of availability for cleaning, then please indicate the desired time slot..
Benefit.section3_desc2: First, indicate your days of availability for cleaning (2 maximum), then please indicate the start date of the first cleaning, as well as the desired time slots.
Benefit.section3_option1: Indicate the available day for the cleaning and then select the preferred time slot.
Benefit.section3_option2: Choose the date of the cleaning

Validation.intro: Just one last click and your request will be sent to the PROS. You will receive proposals in your login area from the PROS who are offering their services in response to your request. Finally, all you have to do is choose the person you want and confirm by completing your payment online.

Validation.terms_and_conditions_link: the terms and conditions of use.
Validation.confirm_housing: I confirm that the home is a personal residence and is not rented out via online marketplaces (Airbnb, Booking, etc.)
Validation.error_message: It seems certain fields are missing
Validation.password_strength_message_2: That's a good start, keep going!

Location.title: LET'S START WITH YOUR POSTAL CODE
Location.section1_text1: Please enter your postal code to know if we are currently serving your area
Location.section2_text1: Sign in to access your information, your services and all new requests
Location.footer: This platform is reserved for personal residences. If you are looking for a cleaning service for a short-term rental,

ThankyouPage.title: Thank you and welcome
ThankyouPage.bloc1_text2: Your request has been sent to our PROS
ThankyouPage.bloc1_text3: Log in now to view your request and choose a PRO
ThankyouPage.bloc2_text2: Log in to create your account password by clicking on the sign in button. You can also log in with your email link. Remember to check your junk mail.
ThankyouPage.bloc2_text3: Browse and start receiving proposals from PROS in your online space.
ThankyouPage.bloc2_text4: Select the PRO who best meets your request, confirm and pay for your service.

Error.postcode_invalid_format: Invalid post code format. Must be H3G0C7 or H3G 0C7

Sms_validation.title: Verification of the validation code
Sms_validation.text1: To continue, enter the validation code sent by message on your phone
